Articles.Content:
I'm guessing it's invite only... but i make ~two or more youtube videos of KSP a week and i would love to play konkers with asteroids.

So, i'd like stand up, wave my arms in the air and shout "pick me! pick me!"

I'm itching to start a new series and i'm waiting for 'the next' update...

I'm guessing it's invite only... but i make ~two or more youtube videos of KSP a week and i would love to play konkers with asteroids.

So, i'd like stand up, wave my arms in the air and shout "pick me! pick me!"

I'm itching to start a new series and i'm waiting for 'the next' update...

I think they youtubers that have ARM are part of Squads Media team (Or Scott Manley, because well...Scott Manley) so other than that I guess you have to wait like the rest of us.

That's pretty much it. Among others, members of the KSP-TV Media Group have early access privileges which allows them a "sneak peek" at the latest build.

While I'm here, I'd also like to point you in the direction of the ARM Megathread we've set up for all things related to the upcoming release
